forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 61F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 53F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.
